ygData.subject: Re: Best 1h blunt weapon...
ygData.msgSnippet: Where do you get the Black Enameled Mace?? ... From: Diina, David  To: EQCheats@onelist.com  Date: Monday, August
ygData.messageBody:
Where do you get the Black Enameled Mace??

-----Original Message-----
From: Diina, David <DDiina@...>
To: EQCheats@onelist.com <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, August 16, 1999 8:53 AM
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Best 1h blunt weapon...


>From: "Diina, David" <DDiina@...>
>
>The Screaming mace is a quest in Crush Bone, not Cazic-Thule.........and
the
>best 1h weapon that I have seen is the Black enameled Mace but I am sure
>there are better...(this is what my lvl 47 cleric friend has right now)
>stats are 8 damage 28 dly
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Omeg Felligan [mailto:omeg_felligan@...]
> Sent: Monday, August 16, 1999 11:22 AM
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Best 1h blunt weapon...
>
> From: "Omeg Felligan" <omeg_felligan@...>
>
> Have you tried the Screaming Mace? I think it's a quest in
>Cazic Thul
> <--yeah I can't spell) that's abuot lvl 35ish. So, if you
>ahve a friend, or
> care to buy one. it's 8 DMG 35 Delay (if I remember
>correctly) and casts
> Yeulp (again can't spell) randomly on you.
>
> That's the best one I know of, but there's probably better
>cause otherwise
> you'd use the same weapon from lvl 35-50 and that'd suck.
>
>
> >From: "Teal Black" <tblack6@...>
> >Reply-To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> >To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
> >Subject: [EQCheats] Best 1h blunt weapon...
> >Date: Sun, 15 Aug 1999 09:55:51 -0700
> >
> >Can anyone tell me what the best 1h blunt weapon is in the
>game and were I
> >can find it. I'm a 17 level cleric and it just seems like
>there are no
> >good weapons that I can use at my current level.
>
